repercussions that the reckless actions by those on Wall Street had in my
personal life, and the lives of those close to me. I was fortunate - my parents
were…

Okay, to make it clear: Yes, WSB won't let me post, I wrote this whole thing up
in emojis and now I'm salty because I can't just copy paste it, and yes, this is
kind of just more GME DD.

However, the thesis of my post is literally "we should open up to everyone, so
anyone can learn the basic facts…

localize.title: 其他短线挤压DD
localize.the_new_excerpt:
好吧，说明一下：是的，WSB不让我发帖，我把这件事写出来了。
在emojis和现在我很咸，因为我不能只是复制粘贴它， 是的，这是
种只是更GME的DD。

不过，我这篇文章的论点，从字面上看就是 "我们应该向大家开放，所以......"。
谁都能学到基本的知识...

localize.title: 其他短線擠壓DD
localize.the_new_excerpt:
好吧，說明一下：是的，WSB不讓我發帖，我把這件事寫出來了。
在emojis和現在我很鹹，因爲我不能只是複製粘貼它， 是的，這是
種只是更GME的DD。

不過，我這篇文章的論點，從字面上看就是 "我們應該向大家開放，所以......"。
誰都能學到基本的知識...
